title: Get filter values for other inventory methods
name: getInventoryFilters

examples.title: Success-Response:

title: Details about media of product
description: Get a media content for specific product id
name: getMediaContent

Parameter.description: The type of media to return. 'Image', 'Video', 'Audio', 'Document' is is supported now
classification of the media, 1006 - primary image, for example. see http://promostandards.org/service/view/11/

examples.title: Success-Response:

title: List of products which media was modified since date
description: Get all product and/or part ids, of media, that changed since a specified date
name: getMediaProductDateModified

Parameter.description: ISO 8601 date since products media was modified

title: Product configuration and prices
description: Get pricing and configuration of a product by id
name: GetConfigurationAndPricing

Parameter.description: type of pricing that should be returned. 'Customer', 'List', 'Net' is is supported now
type of configuration of the product to be returned. 'Blank' and 'Decorate' is is supported now

title: Product configuration and prices
description: Get list of charges and information on how to calculate charges
name: getAvailableCharges

title: Names of location on product
description: Get names of locations for a given product id
name: getAvailableLocations

examples.title: Success-Response:

title: Decoration color of product
description: Get describe possible decoration colors of product location
name: getDecorationColors

title: Details of product
description: Get detail product data based on a specific product
name: getProduct

Parameter.description: label of custom size, set only if sizes.labelSize was set on 'CUSTOM'

examples.title: Success-Response:

title: List of products which is closeout now
description: Get list of product ids and optional part ids for all items which currently have an close out status
name: getProductCloseOut

title: List of products modified since date
description: Get list of product Ids and optional part ids for all items which have changed since the date.
name: getProductDateModified

title: List of products which not available for sell
name: getProductNotSellable

title: List of products which available for sell
name: getProductSellable
